<includeonly><chartscss>
<table class="charts-css pie {{{classes|}}}">
  {{#if:{{{caption|}}}|<caption>{{{caption}}}</caption>}}

  <tr>
    <th scope="col">{{{labelHeader|}}}</th>
    <th scope="col">{{{valueHeader|}}}</th>
  </tr>

{{{slices|}}}
</table>
</chartscss></includeonly><noinclude>
== Template:ChartsCss pie ==
Renders a Charts.css pie chart table and loads the stylesheet (via the `<chartscss>` tag).

=== Parameters ===
* `classes` (optional): additional Charts.css classes, e.g. `show-heading show-labels show-primary-axis show-data-axes show-10-secondary-axes`
* `caption` (optional): table caption
* `labelHeader`, `valueHeader`: column headings
* `slices`: wikitext that expands to one or more slice rows (typically via `Template:ChartsCss slice`)

=== Example ===
<pre>
{{ChartsCss pie
 | classes=show-heading show-labels show-primary-axis show-data-axes show-10-secondary-axes
 | caption=Chart Heading
 | labelHeader=#
 | valueHeader=Progress
 | slices=
   {{ChartsCss slice | label=1 | start=0.0 | end=0.1 | data=10 | tooltip=data: 10<br/>more info }}
   {{ChartsCss slice | label=2 | start=0.1 | end=0.4 | data=30 | tooltip=data: 30<br/>more info }}
   {{ChartsCss slice | label=3 | start=0.4 | end=0.6 | data=20 | tooltip=data: 20<br/>more info }}
   {{ChartsCss slice | label=4 | start=0.6 | end=0.7 | data=10 | tooltip=data: 10<br/>more info }}
   {{ChartsCss slice | label=5 | start=0.7 | end=1.0 | data=30 | tooltip=data: 30<br/>more info }}
}}
</pre>

Notes:
* `start`/`end` should be values from `0.0` to `1.0` (fractions of the circle).
* MediaWiki does not accept table sectioning/column elements like `<thead>`, `<tbody>`, `<tfoot>`, `<colgroup>`, and `<col>` (even when you use HTML syntax in wikitext). If you copy examples from chartscss.org that use these elements, they may be stripped or ignored. This template intentionally avoids them.
</noinclude>
